name: anon-chat
title: Solo Developer
shortDes: a stand-alone, flat-file, anonymous chat app
section1:
Developed on a lazy Saturday afternoon, anon-chat is just a random attempt at an anonymous chat web app.

It's more or less an API written in PHP, with a front-end that sends requests to the API using JQuery to learn more about it's state, and what it should be doing.

My two favorite features of this app is that:

1. Your message color is what tells other users who you are relative to other messages.

2. You can start a new chatroom with ANY name just by typing it into the address bar.
